events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit as expected, and I want to request a refund immediately.
The case has been tagged under refund since the customer requested a money back due to sizing issues.
Case assigned to customer support representative Anna to assist with the refund process.
Hello! I'm Anna, I'll help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return?
Please send over your order ID and confirm if the product was unopened or unused to proceed with the refund.
My order number is 123456789. The jacket has been tried on once but has no damage; I want to return it because it is too small.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund once we receive the returned product. I will provide a prepaid shipping label for the return.
That sounds good. Please send the shipping label as soon as possible so I can return it without extra cost.
The prepaid label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just following up to see if you have shipped the jacket back using the prepaid label we provided last week.
Yes, I dropped the package at the post office this morning. Thanks for your assistance.
We have received your return and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Please share your feedback on how we handled your refund request.
I completed the survey and am happy with the quick and easy refund process. Thank you very much for your help!
Closing the case after confirming the refund was completed and customer satisfaction was received.
